misc: Always a gentleman despite occasionally losing his temper on the course
biography: Daniel is a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, representing Oulujokilaakson Golfklubi ry. He has participated in 7 past Hector Trophée events and claimed the Hector Trophée title twice, marking him as a strong competitor in the pair format. While he is still actively participating in Hector events, he is not currently slated to participate in Hector Trophée 2025.
Known for his competitive spirit, Daniel occasionally struggles to maintain his composure on the course. Despite these occasional lapses, he is a true gentleman.
